group_1.textLeft: …I thought you hadn't been back home@for a while.
What are you wearing?
We've been over this so many times.

group_1.textRight: Please forgive me.

group_1.textLeft: What do you think you're doing?@You didn't even call me once!
Ever since you moved out, it's like you've lost@your mind.

group_1.textRight: Ah, please forgive me.
(...It seems that she's the same as ever.)
(Well, I'm also the same...just nodding and@agreeing.)
(...*Giggle* Yes, I'm the same as ever.)
(I'm still far away from being my "ideal adult".)
It's because I learned to face reality and still@dreamt that I'd reach my ideals.
That's how I became the person I am today.

group_1.textLeft: But you still did some pretty bad things@in the Wings of the Magius, right?

group_1.textRight: Wah… That's a sore spot!

group_1.textLeft: Well, as long as you're alive, you're bound@to make some mistakes…

group_1.textRight: Yes, it's an immutable piece of my life.
…It's a part of the path I've walked.
My journey to become the "ideal adult"@I envisioned when I was young.
Do you think I succeeded?

group_1.textLeft: Huh? I guess…
From my point of view, you seem pretty@mature…

group_1.textRight: Yeah, I feel like I can rely on you…

group_1.textLeft: Sometimes you're a little full of it,@but you get what needs doing, done.
So that gets you a harbor seal from me!

group_1.textRight: Huh? What on earth does that mean?

group_1.textLeft: Um…[chara:100301:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:100301:motion_100][chara:100301:cheek_0][chara:100301:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:100301:lipSynch_1]Oh! Like… You've got her "seal"@of approval!

group_1.textRight: I think you're doing great too!

group_1.textLeft: Hmph, You're still such a child, Kaede.

group_1.textRight: Eh, why?!

group_1.textLeft: If she really was an "ideal adult", we wouldn't@be having this conversation.
It's not easy to be the person you want to be…

group_1.textRight: You have a point, maybe…?

group_1.textLeft: …I know how that feels.
The clearer your vision of the future is…
The harder it can be to achieve it.

group_1.textRight: Yeah, that's right.
Becoming an adult seems like such a@straightforward thing as a child…

group_1.textLeft: As for you, Mifuyu, you're just as much@of a crybaby as ever.
Since you've started living alone, your life@has become full of all sorts of things.

group_1.textRight: I wanted to be someone who can be depended@on, you know?
However, being too dependable has its@problems too…

group_1.textLeft: But that means you'll never become your@ideal adult!

group_1.textRight: Yes, that's right.

group_1.textLeft: No way!

group_1.textRight: It's not like that!
Her ideal is still achievable!

group_1.textLeft: Huh?

group_1.textRight: *Giggle* That means…
